author: Frances Martel, Frances Martel
title: Taiwan: China Flooded Twitter with Fake 'Taiwanese' Apologies to WHO Chief
description: The government of Taiwan accused communist China on Friday of setting up fake Twitter accounts to apologize to Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the head of the World Health Organization (WHO), on Taiwan's behalf after the former Ethiopian politician claimed Taiwan…
content: The government of Taiwan accused communist China on Friday of setting up fake Twitter accounts to apologize to Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the head of the World Health Organization (WHO), on Taiwan’s behalf after the former Ethiopian politician claimed Taiwan… [+5438 chars]
